General.Name: Xplore Resources Corp
General.Description: Xplore Resources Corp., a mining exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of copper and gold projects in the Americas. The company holds a 100% interest in the Valk project covering an area of approximately 1,614 hectares located in British Columbia, Canada. It also has an option to acquire 100% interests in the Upper Red Lake gold project that consists of 12 contiguous mineral claims covering an area of approximately 1,750 hectares; the Pringle Lake property, which comprises 78 contiguous cells covering an area of approximately 1,560 hectares; and the Perrigo Lake property that includes 166 contiguous cell claims covering an area of approximately 3,370 hectares located in the Red Lake mining division, Ontario, Canada. Xplore Resources Corp. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Brookfield Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2T3
